s
.
<p>s</p>
.

.
a ${widget} in a paragraph
.
<p>a <span widgetparams="widget" class="widgetContainer" id="widget-0undefined"></span> in a paragraph</p>
.

.
clearly not a widget $1.23 definition
.
<p>clearly not a widget $1.23 definition</p>
.

.
${image?fileName=joy%2Epng&align=None}
.
<p><span widgetparams="image?fileName=joy%2Epng&amp;align=None" class="widgetContainer" id="widget-1undefined"></span></p>
.

.
${toc}
.
<p><span widgetparams="toc" class="widgetContainer" id="widget-2undefined"></span></p>
.

.
\${toc}
.
<p>${toc}</p>
.

.
$\{toc}
.
<p>${toc}</p>
.

coverage
.
*~f
.
<p>*~f</p>
.

clean up init (constructor)
remove icon
